item.title: TV2
item.link: $doregex[m3u8]|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/50.0.2661.102 Safari/537.36&Referer=http://cdn-rtm-player.gluempsapp.com/105/10148

regex.name: m3u8
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/50.0.2661.102 Safari/537.36

regex.name: get=URL
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import requests, re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'http://www.layarku.tv/media/tv2m.php?url=http://www.layarku.tv/media2/tvm.m3u8 '): headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0','Referer': 'http://www.layarku.tv/media/tv2.php'} source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) m3u8 = re.findall('BANDWIDTH=[\d\D]*\n.*?([^\"]+)', source.text)[0] return m3u8 + '|headers'

regex.name: get=URL
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import requests, re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'http://www.layarku.tv/media/tv3sec.php?url=http://www.layarku.tv/media2/tvmysec.m3u8 '): headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0','Referer': 'http://www.layarku.tv/media/tv3m.php'} source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) m3u8 = re.findall('BANDWIDTH=[\d\D]*\n.*?([^\"]+)', source.text)[0] return m3u8 + '|headers'

regex.name: get=URL
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import requests, re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'http://www.layarku.tv/media/ntv7sec.php?url=http://www.layarku.tv/media2/tvmysec.m3u8 '): headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0','Referer': 'http://www.layarku.tv/media/ntv7m.php'} source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) m3u8 = re.findall('BANDWIDTH=[\d\D]*\n.*?([^\"]+)', source.text)[0] return m3u8 + '|headers'

regex.name: get=URL
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import requests, re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'http://www.layarku.tv/media/tv9sec.php?url=http://www.layarku.tv/media2/tvmysec.m3u8 '): headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0','Referer': 'http://www.layarku.tv/media/tv9m.php'} source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) m3u8 = re.findall('BANDWIDTH=[\d\D]*\n.*?([^\"]+)', source.text)[0] return m3u8 + '|headers'
